item.content:encoded:
Jeremiah

Jeremiah 33:8 I will cleanse away their sins against me, and I will forgive all their sins of rebellion.

2 Corinthians

2 Corinthians 5:17 What this means is that those who become Christians become new persons. They are not the same anymore, for the old life is gone. A new life has begun!

Daily Prayer Points:

  • I pray for forgiveness of all my sins according to the riches of Christ’s grace
  • Father, forgive the sins of Your people and show us mercy
  • Father, remove our sins from us
  • Lord Jesus, forgive all our sins and cleanse us from all unrighteousness
  • Father, be merciful to us Your children
  • Father, remember not our sins and iniquities by the power of the blood of Jesus
  • Father, draw me away from the iniquities of my past
  • Father, let not the sins of the wicked dominate my life
  • Father, I receive the joy of repentance
  • Father, I receive the joy of Christ’s forgiveness today
  • Father, I pray for grace to forgive those who have oended me
  • Father, refresh my soul and spirit
